verses.name: Isaiah 2:8
verses.text: Their land also is full of idols; they worship the work of their own hands, that which their own fingers have made:

verses.name: Isaiah 2:9
verses.text: And the mean man boweth down, and the great man humbleth himself: therefore forgive them not.

verses.name: Isaiah 2:10
verses.text: Enter into the rock, and hide thee in the dust, for fear of the Lord, and for the glory of his majesty.

verses.name: Isaiah 2:11
verses.text: The lofty looks of man shall be humbled, and the haughtiness of men shall be bowed down, and the Lord alone shall be exalted in that day.
